scholarships.header_subtitle: Discover and apply for scholarships including PMSSS, NSP and J&K state schemes
scholarships.alert_profile_completion: Complete your profile to get accurate eligibility checking for scholarships.
scholarships.no_eligible_message: Complete your profile to check eligibility
scholarships.scholarship_pmsss_description: Scholarship for J&K students to pursue higher education outside the UT
scholarships.scholarship_pmsss_benefits: Tuition fee up to ₹1,25,000;Maintenance allowance ₹1,00,000;Books & stationery ₹5,000
scholarships.scholarship_pmsss_documents: Domicile Certificate;Class 12 Marks Sheet;Family Income Certificate;Bank Account Details
scholarships.scholarship_nsp_description: Merit-based scholarship for students from economically weaker sections
scholarships.scholarship_nsp_benefits: Scholarship amount varies by course;Direct bank transfer;Renewable annually
scholarships.scholarship_nsp_documents: Income Certificate;Caste Certificate (if applicable);Academic Certificates;Bank Account Details
scholarships.scholarship_jk-merit_description: State scholarship for meritorious students from J&K
scholarships.scholarship_jk-merit_benefits: Annual scholarship ₹25,000;Fee waiver in govt colleges;Book allowance
scholarships.scholarship_jk-merit_documents: Domicile Certificate;Academic Certificates;Income Certificate;College Admission Letter
scholarships.scholarship_minority_description: Scholarship for students from minority communities
scholarships.scholarship_minority_benefits: Scholarship for professional courses;Maintenance allowance;Books & equipment allowance
scholarships.scholarship_minority_documents: Minority Community Certificate;Income Certificate;Academic Certificates;Bank Account Details
scholarships.scholarship_inspire_description: Scholarship for students pursuing science courses
scholarships.scholarship_inspire_documents: Class 12 Science Marks Sheet;Income Certificate;Course Admission Letter;Bank Account Details

notifications.notif_header_subtitle: Stay up-to-date with your career journey.

notifications.notif_cuet_message: The application window for CUET 2024 is closing soon. Don't miss this opportunity!
notifications.notif_pmsss_message: Apply for the Prime Minister Special Scholarship Scheme on the official portal.

notifications.notif_app_status_message: Your application to Amar Singh College is being reviewed.
notifications.notif_jee_message: Admit cards for JEE Main are now available for download on the official website.
notifications.notif_quiz_complete_message: You've successfully completed the career assessment quiz! View your personalized results.

applicationTracker.tracker_subtitle: Stay on top of your college and scholarship applications.
applicationTracker.no_pending_message: You don't have any applications that are currently under review.
applicationTracker.no_accepted_message: It's still early! Your acceptance letters will appear here.
applicationTracker.next_step_1: Log in to the college's admission portal.
applicationTracker.next_step_2: Pay the admission fee of ₹{{fees}} to secure your seat.
applicationTracker.next_step_3: Submit the original documents for verification at the college.
applicationTracker.next_step_4: Complete the admission formalities before the deadline.

resume.resume_builder_subtitle: Create and manage a professional resume to apply for jobs and scholarships.
resume.alert_download_soon: Resume download functionality is coming soon!
resume.default_objective: A highly motivated and dedicated student from Jammu & Kashmir seeking to leverage my academic knowledge and problem-solving skills to contribute to a dynamic organization.
resume.default_achievement_1: Successfully completed final year project with distinction.
resume.default_achievement_2: Won first place in the district-level science fair.
resume.default_achievement_3: Served as school head boy/head girl, demonstrating leadership skills.
resume.default_project_desc_1: Developed a prototype for an intelligent system to optimize traffic flow using sensors and real-time data analysis.

results_header_subtitle: Here’s a breakdown of your interests and aptitudes to help you find your ideal path.
aptitude_strength_desc: You have a strong ability to understand and solve complex problems.
action_explore_colleges_desc: Find the best colleges that offer your recommended courses in Jammu & Kashmir.
action_apply_scholarships_desc: Discover scholarships that can help you fund your education and achieve your dreams.
action_get_guidance_desc: Chat with a career counselor to discuss your results and plan your next steps.
no_results_message: It looks like you haven't taken the career quiz yet.
riasec_desc_realistic: People with a Realistic interest are doers. They like working with their hands, tools, and machinery.
riasec_desc_investigative: People with an Investigative interest are thinkers. They enjoy exploring ideas and solving problems with logic.
riasec_desc_artistic: People with an Artistic interest are creators. They prefer unstructured tasks and using their imagination.
riasec_desc_social: People with a Social interest are helpers. They enjoy working with others to inform, heal, and teach.
riasec_desc_enterprising: People with an Enterprising interest are persuaders. They like leading, influencing, and managing projects.
riasec_desc_conventional: People with a Conventional interest are organizers. They enjoy working with data, numbers, and following procedures.
